mapper.select: SELECT snc.coupon_id, snc.type, snc.name, snc.image, snc.amount, snc.min_point, snc.use_type, snc.end_time, snc.start_time, snc.amount, snc.min_point, snc.use_type, snch.id, snch.get_type, sncsr.series_id, snctr.theme_id FROM star_nft_coupon_history snch LEFT JOIN star_nft_coupon snc ON snch.coupon_id = snc.coupon_id LEFT JOIN star_nft_coupon_series_relation sncsr ON sncsr.coupon_id = snch.coupon_id LEFT JOIN star_nft_coupon_theme_relation snctr ON snctr.coupon_id = snch.coupon_id <where> snch.is_deleted = 0 <if test="req.useStatus != null"> AND snch.use_status = #{req.useStatus} </if> <if test="req.userId != null"> AND snch.user_id = #{req.userId} </if> <if test="req.seriesId != null"> AND sncsr.series_id = #{req.seriesId} </if> <if test="req.themeId != null"> AND snctr.theme_id = #{req.themeId} </if> <if test="req.minPoint != null and req.minPoint != 0"> AND snctr.min_point <= #{req.minPoint} </if> </where>
